96.eng-name: Holding Fast to the Qur'an and Sunnah

hadiths.text: Narrated `Aisha:The Prophet (ﷺ) did something as it was allowed from the religious point of view but some people refrained from it. When the Prophet (ﷺ) heard of that, he, after glorifying and praising Allah, said, "Why do some people refrain from doing something which I do? By Allah, I know Allah more than they

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا يُكْرَهُ مِنَ التَّعَمُّقِ وَالتَّنَازُعِ فِي الْعِلْمِ وَالْغُلُوِّ فِي الدِّينِ وَالْبِدَعِ
chapter.eng-name: Going deeply into and arguing about knowledge, and exaggerating in religion, and inventing heresies
